snippet.title: 21 Minutes of Marvel vs Capcom Infinite Story Mode Gameplay
snippet.description:
The opening 21 minutes of Marvel vs Capcom Infinite story mode gameplay.

Catch up on Everything E3 2017 here!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3VjBaR59WYQ&list=PLraFbwCoisJBbdFblzX5WnoMktUk7KOCN&index=1

Check out our IGN Access coverage of E3 2017!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XA4jwTPo9AY&list=PLraFbwCoisJCMnL5mdxT_Ey22QuAhPEiI&index=1
